title: Crypto wrap: Bitcoin rallies 14%, Ethereum up 11% amid ETF optimism - Business Standard
content:
Bitcoin has surged 14 per cent in the last seven days amid optimism around Bitcoin Exchange-Traded-Fund (ETF). On Tuesday, the largest cryptocurrency by market cap had touched its highest level since May 2022. On Friday, it was trading at $34,134, down from a peak of nearly $35,000, data from CoinMarketCap showed.

"The ETF anticipation is driving FOMO among investors who are flocking to Bitcoin as its market dominance grows to 2021 levels," said Rajagopal Menon, vice president at WazirX. Bitcoin's dominance was 53 per cent on Friday.

Several investment firms, including BlackRock and Fidelity Investments, have pending applications for bitcoin ETFs in the US, and speculation on their likely approval was fuelled by BlacRock's iShares ETF listing on the website.

A Bitcoin ETF is expected to make buying and selling Bitcoin easier through the stock market.

A US federal appeals court on Monday also formalised a victory for Grayscale Investments LLC in its bid to create a spot Bitcoin ETF over objections from the US Securities and Exchange Commission. This led to market optimism.

"Remarkably, crypto as an asset class has been decoupling from other 'risk on' assets like equities, which corrected sharply due to the rising macro and geo-political instability," added Parth Chaturvedi, investments lead at CoinSwitch Venture.

On Friday, the market saw a sell-off but it was majorly due to profit booking. "The crypto market is showing signs of cooling off after the mega rally in the past few days," said Shivam Thukral, chief executive officer (CEO) of BuyUcoin.

What to expect?

"Bitcoin is moving up by taking support from the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA-D). However, it's still facing a challenge at the $35,000 level. If it successfully breaks through, it could reach the $39,000 to $40,000 range, with potential support around $31,000 to $32,000. For Ethereum, the $1,740 level may act as a support, and crossing $1,860 could push it toward $2,000," the crypto exchange CoinDCX research team said.

title: Goldman Sachs: Dencun Upgrade Improves Ethereum Scalability - Bankless Times
content:
The Ethereum Mainnet’s Dencun Upgrade will move the blockchain in the direction of scalable settlement according to a report by Goldman Sachs, cited by CoinDesk.

Enhanced security and lower gas fees

The Dencun upgrade will enhance the Ethereum Mainnet’s scalability using rollups, improve network security, and optimize gas fees. It is expected to take place in the first quarter of next year.

Goldman Sachs wrote that Dencun’s main impact would be raising data availability for layer-2 rollups via proto-danksharding. This would lead to lower rollup transaction costs, which end users can benefit from.

What are rollups?

Layer 1 blockchains are like base layers, or the blockchain’s underlying infrastructure. Layer 2 blockchains, on the other hand, are a set of separate chains or off-chain systems running on top of Layer 1s. The Ethereum Mainnet is the most-used Layer 1 blockchain.

Rollups process transactions on a Layer 2 chain, then port the data back to the L1 at a minimal cost.

Proto what?

Goldman Sachs’ report adds that proto-danksharding would be used to set the infrastructure for future scalability upgrades as part of the Mainnet’s ‘Surge’ roadmap, including danksharding.

The Surge isthe second phase of Ethereum's developmental roadmap following the Merge, during which the Mainnet transitioned to a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus mechanism. During the Surge, it will scale using rollups.

Sharding put to good use

Danksharding will enhance Ethereum’s scalability. It divides the network into shards, but uses them to make more space for group data instead of increasing throughput. Each shard is a separate chain with its own set of transactions and smart contracts. These shards can be processed in parallel, which can significantly increase a network's capacity and throughput.

The report emphasizes that Dencun would enhance Ethereum’s scalability via rollups, improve network security, optimize gas fees, and execute important housekeeping updates.

title: Privacy on Ethereum: V. Buterin Supports a Unique Project! - Cointribune EN
content:
Fri 27 Oct 2023 ▪ 3 min of reading ▪ by Mikaia A.

Enabling the creation of private accounts in Ethereum is the goal of Nocturne Labs. In a seed funding round that raised $6 million, the specialist in anonymous transactions received support from several notable entities, such as Robot Ventures, Bankless Ventures, and more. To the surprise of many, Vitalik Buterin, co-founder of Ethereum, reached into his pocket to support the project.

Vitalik Buterin’s Affection for Private Accounts

Expanding Ethereum by all means, that’s always been Vitalik Buterin’s approach. He doesn’t hesitate to discuss the potential integration of various features into the blockchain. The idea of providing the benefits of Artificial Intelligence (AI) to Ethereum users also appeals to him.

Vitalik Buterin invests in Nocturne Labs, which aims to bring private accounts to Ethereum https://t.co/1S58bKiG3Y — The Block (@TheBlock__) October 25, 2023 Vitalik Buterin doesn’t hesitate to spend millions of dollars for Ethereum development

The article from The Block addressing this topic mentions a seed funding round that began early in the year, back in January. It took Nocturne Labs seven months to see their efforts rewarded. This resulted in the $6 million fund, with contributions from Bain Capital Crypto, Bankless Ventures, Robot Ventures, Polychain Capital, and Vitalik Buterin.

Luke Tchang, co-founder and CEO of Nocturne, clarified that this funding round included token subscription rights.

What Does Nocturne Labs Really Want?

Nocturne Labs is an American startup with the ambition to develop a protocol that supports anonymous crypto transactions on Ethereum. With this initiative, Luke Tchang’s team will provide access to ‘internal’ accounts supported by Nocturne.

Here is an exhaustive list of the advantages provided by Nocturne:

Receive/deposit crypto funds into an anonymous Nocturne account.

Zero-knowledge proof (ZK) of the existence of funds.

Use crypto assets to pay, trade, stake, and more.

In other words, Nocturne will make cryptocurrency asset ownership confidential. Users who are attracted to its services will no longer need to worry about potential data disclosure regarding their cryptocurrency assets, whether they are receiving payments, making purchases, or storing bitcoins (BTC) or ethers (ETH) on the blockchain.

Now we understand why Vitalik Buterin supports Nocturne Labs’ initiative. He, who has caused panic through unexplained transfers of ETH, may be able to conceal his transfer activities by November, when Nocturne’s protocol is set to deploy on the mainnet.

title: $XRP Price Could Surpass $100 and Has 'No Ceiling', Says Early Ethereum Advisor - CryptoGlobe
content:
Early Ethereum ($ETH) advisor Steven Nerayoff, who is also a popular member of the $XRP community has recently said that he believes the price of XRP has “no ceiling” and agreed it could surpass the $100 mark.

In a post shared on the microblogging platform X (formerly known as Twitter), Nerayoff responded to a user asking whether he believes XRP has a “bright future” and could see its price “get above $10 possibly upto $100.,” noting he believes that XRP’s price “has no ceiling if they achieve their objectives.”

Per Nerayoff the question is complex, but he believes that usually a lower XRP price “would make their offering more attractive,” while fintech firm Ripple – a major player in the XRP space – is “clearly the odds on favorite to win in a “network effects” model.”

Once Ripple achieves that objective, he said, XRP must be used, at which point the cryptocurrency’s price won’t have a ceiling.

I believe XRP has no ceiling if they achieve their objectives. It’s not a simple response but I’ll give a high level take. Usually a lower XRP price would make their offering more attractive. However, @Ripple is clearly the odds on favorite to win in a “network effects” model.… — Steven Nerayoff (@StevenNerayoff) October 27, 2023

Nerayoff went on to add that the US dollar has networks effects and is the global reserve currency, which means there is “clearly no ceiling on the price of the dollar as it gets massively depreciated but the price becomes irrelevant, overshadowed by its required necessity.”

He added that XRP could take the role of global reserve currency “in part of whole,” and suggested that Ripple may be being “viciously & unfairly targeted” because of its potential.

Recently, a popular cryptocurrency analyst has recently made a daring $XRP price prediction suggesting that the native token of the XRP Ledger could soon see its price surge to a whopping $220, based on a historical pattern that would lead to that level if it was repeated.

title: Ethereum, Binance, And Bitgert: A Comparative Analysis Of Cryptocurrency Titans - Outlook India
content: While most of the altcoin are seen in green light, Ethereum has not climbed the ladder yet. Last week, while products catering to institutional investors channeled over $55 million in fresh capital into Bitcoin (BTC), bearish products attracted $1.6 million. Meanwhile, altcoins like Binance Coin (BNB) and Cardano (ADA) witnessed more modest inflows, amounting to $0.2 million and $0.1 million, respectively. However, Ethereum (ETH) products reported outflows of $7.4 million. Persistent concerns revolving around Ethereum prompted a further withdrawal of $7.4 million, making Ethereum the sole altcoin experiencing outflows last week.

When Should I Use a Bitcoin Robot?

Many engagements may not enable traders to trade on top of their full-time jobs due to the duties of their full-time occupations. Bots will automate all of the mundane tasks, freeing up people’s time and focus for more vital tasks.

Traders are prone to being overly emotional when making trading decisions. They may choose to stay in the market for a longer period than they should, rather than withdrawing promptly in the hopes of generating a profit. This has the potential to cause significant damage to your portfolio, which is why an automated trader is utilized to avoid it. After you’ve chosen your trade techniques, the software will execute them on your behalf with ruthless accuracy.

Some trade skills are difficult to put into practice because they take a long time to develop or are too complicated for the typical individual to comprehend. Even if these trading methods are profitable, implementing them necessitates the use of advanced technologies. Worthy Tips for Beginners to Make Positive Returns Using Bitcoin Robots

Begin with a small budget

Starting with a small amount of money and working your way up is the best advice. Begin with the bare minimum ($250) and gradually increase your investment. Even if you have prior trading experience, it is recommended that you avoid investing large quantities of money immediately soon. It is impossible to predict the future of the markets, and you will never be able to control them no matter who you are or what you do. As a result, start small and gradually increase your dedication over time; there’s no need to rush into anything.

Profits should be set aside for a rainy day

You should set aside a percentage of your earnings once you start earning money for future usage or investment. You should try to recoup as much of your initial investment as possible while keeping your account cash flow positive at all times. Because every cent in your account is profit, you will eventually reach a position of perfect security with no risk.

Let go of your Ego

Make a point of remaining humble and accepting the fact that no matter what you do, you will never be a successful trader; in fact, no one will ever be a successful trader. Even the most successful traders, regardless of their level of success, make catastrophic mistakes regularly. This rule applies to traders as well. They can only keep their position by winning a few games. Likewise, keep in mind that you are no better than anyone else, and that, in the end, the market selects what is best.

Always seek to Learn

You should continue to seek out fresh information and expertise whenever and wherever you get the chance if you have the opportunity. If you want to excel at Bitcoin trading, find many well-known brokers and follow their advice. You can also participate in online communities and forums where you can discuss trade and financial theory with other individuals. Others, such as successful traders who post videos on YouTube and others who tweet daily advice and even describe the trades they made that day, are available to listen to and learn from. Always remember that you should continue to learn new things.

Market access is available around the clock

Possible Risks when Trading with Ethereum Code

People who do not put in enough effort to understand how the system works are one of the numerous reasons why they fail at trading. As a result, they make a big number of investments and lose a lot of money, which is just one of the numerous reasons why people fail at trading. Keep in mind that the Bitcoin market is extremely unpredictable and that investing a substantial sum of money without fully understanding the risks entails taking a significant chance of losing your money.

When you convert to automated trading, you effectively give up the ability to trade on your own time, at your discretion, and with your judgment. Because of the current status of the bitcoin market, your cryptocurrency charts may respond unexpectedly. As a result, you won’t be able to control your need to enter or exit the market based on current market analysis until at least the middle of the trade. As a result, it’s even more important to ensure that your initial analysis is accurate in light of these new events.
